pr_title: Don't throw runtime exception if id not found

timeline.message: Don't throw runtime exception if id not found

timeline.bodyText:
What happens if we add a one-sided direction to the home screen and use that here?
Also, could we log an error (Timber.e) here to make this easier to debug?
timeline.author: gino-m

replies.bodyText:
What happens if we add a one-sided direction to the home screen and use that here?

During config change, the navigation doesn't happen via Navigator. So the destination id is still unset.

Also, could we log an error (Timber.e) here to make this easier to debug?

Done
replies.author: shobhitagarwal1612
